Onto building the future we want to live in ğŸ™ğŸ’ª

Mirror makes it so easy to add crowdfunding, so I thought why not tryğŸ™ƒ

Eth goes to:
- Writers of stories
- People that build something cool on 30ofWeb3
- MetaGame, for building MetaOS, onboarding ppl & other cool shit we do for the Ethereum DAO ecosystem like MetaSys or MyMeta

Things you could do next:
- Spend some time figuring out your Ikigai
- Write about your vision of â€œthe world after ethereumâ€
- Start building it & join 30 Days of Web3
- Join one of the projects mentioned or any else you feel aligned with
- Drop some eth on all of this ğŸ¤·â€â™‚ï¸

Its easier than ever to find people you share dreams with & coordinate on things you wouldnt imagine possible b4

Great time to ask yourself:
- If I could solve any problem or do anything, wat do?
- Why am I here?

Then find others & spend the next few years giving it all.

So... https://t.co/ksoSOltOvZ

Despite things that still suck, I have high hopes for the DAO space!

Seems like the most vibrant part of crypto, a haven for dreamers. Though token voting is still dominant, a lot are aware of its perils & working towards alternatives or ways to soften it.
Problems being solved! https://t.co/fGJHI7LufM

More like mosaics of interoperable building blocks than monolithic platforms of the past.

These super-platforms should actually be possible to build, for the first time ever ğŸ˜…

- And weâ€™re building one of themğŸ™ƒ
https://t.co/UiBZwT8F1T

Anyway, let's start wrapping this up!

Most likely there wonâ€™t be â€œa chat platformâ€, â€œa social media platformâ€, â€œa freelancing platformâ€, or â€œan educational platformâ€ - instead, different interoperable building blocks will be assembled into platforms that are *just right* for this or that specific community.
... https://t.co/rctuCgm4m2

...Imagine how much more value could be unlocked if all of this was interoperable ğŸ¤¯

Discord & twitter just wonâ€™t do.

To enable the flow of information, people & resources between communities and allow everyone to be more effective, I think weâ€™ll need *proper* platforms.

Imagine how much value could be unlocked inside of your DAO if instead of having 150 channels, there were proper interfaces for:
- Getting a better view of what's going on
- What needs to happen next
- Who are the people
- What are their skills & time availability
- etc etc etc https://t.co/VABr4qfi8q

If you want to see the ones I listed, you're gonna have to go read the thingğŸ™ƒ

Know any more building blocks or tools? Please comment ğŸ™

- We need to make it as easy as possible for people to create building blocks,
- We also need to start assembling these building blocks.. https://t.co/xvNjzLsuUJ

Many individual pieces need to exist before we can put them together into functional decentralized societies.

I know because my whole idea with @MetaFam was to â€œput the pieces together & form the bigger pictureâ€ - before realizing most of the pieces didn't really exist yet ğŸ˜‚

Came up with your meme yet?

If not, know there are plenty of great existing missions out there doing anything related to Ethereum & DAOs ğŸ™ƒ

Overall, there seems to be this belief that Ethereum is core infrastructure for societies of the future, but how do we get there?

So let's build meme driven organizations.
- Some higher purpose, but make it not just a facade ğŸ™ƒ
- Maybe write or adopt something like the MetaManifesto ğŸ¤·â€â™‚ï¸
https://t.co/AyGXMiq3lg https://t.co/mOWfHt2RWu

Token voting will almost inevitably result in the same kind of dynamicsğŸ™ˆ

More important than ever to put the meme at the center of what we doing & make sure incentives are properly aligned.
- Coupled tightly with a "triple bottom line" sort of thinking.
https://t.co/60o5GpLlbb

The problem with trad corps is that they become completely driven by profit, optimized to extract.

They might have â€œa missionâ€ but it becomes skewed by their fiduciary duty towards shareholders ğŸ˜¬

Let's try to avoid this with DAOs? https://t.co/TZikG5Imgy

Not working on anything yet? Maybe take one of these visions & run with it! ğŸ¤·â€â™‚ï¸

- If you're starting a DAO, the most important thing to get right is the meme.
- Then, to make sure the incentives are aligned.
Because...

How it will go down:
- Interested will join https://t.co/joHXiO9rzO
- Serious ones will write stories
- Ones that write great stories will get invited to another group
- Other group may be a DAO with magical NFTs or some shit
- Maybe they compile it into a novel, who knows
...

Seriously though!
@owocki @ameensol @austingriffith @thegrifft @MarkBeylin @Sim_Pop @VitalikButerin @Travis_Wyche @joelthorst @DekanBro @pet3rpan_ @albiverse & YOU!
Lets write some stories & inspire the next generation of buidlorsğŸ’ª
No? At least tag some more people & retweetğŸ™ƒ

Consider this a challenge to dream & write a short story about:

- That solarpunk future, where Moloch manifestations are effectively dealt with
- â€œWorld after Ethereumâ€

Let's stop with all the dystopian sci-fi bullshit & think of a future we *want* to live in ğŸ™ https://t.co/vD1e5K1iNE

So, how do we fight Moloch & create the solarpunk future?

I'm thinking:
- Come up with more visions of better futures
- Make it easier to create building blocks
- Start assembling building blocks into platforms
- Pick our fights & support causes outside of our bubbles

... https://t.co/zEBL08OwQ2

Letâ€™s not be like Silicon Valley bros saying weâ€™re "making an impactâ€ by building a new app for the privileged while their streets are full of shit & homeless people. Every project should have a % of their tokens go to public goods ğŸ¤·â€â™‚ï¸

Are we really changing anything if capital remains what has the final say as well as the main goal?

Decentralized coordination is great but again, what are we coordinating towards?

We should be careful weâ€™re not replicating patterns of the old world.

So far, wealth inequality is worse than in the real world & most DAOs are turning out to be plutocracies.

Some are even starting to ask â€œshould DAO workers have a fiduciary duty towards token holders?â€ ğŸ˜…

Where is the DAO space going *then*?
Guess the next step is networks of interlocking DAOs, dStates or however we name them.

Means weâ€™re changing the world for the better?
Not necessarily.

Making coordination easier doesn't solve the â€œwhat are we coordinating towardsâ€ problem..

In short, it's hard for DAO:
- Summoners to find everything they need to start a DAO
- Operators to see whatâ€™s going on & find things they need to succeed
- Contributors to stay connected & in the loop with more than a handful of DAOs
But it will get better ğŸ™ƒ

The truth is, weâ€™re still super early ğŸ¤·â€â™‚ï¸

If you ever tried building a DAO, you know the DAO framework itself is far from the only thing needed.

Everything else you need is a jumble of different web3 & web2 tools, platforms, knowledge sources & communitiesğŸ¤¦â€â™‚ï¸ https://t.co/wu6DBM86Pj

We do have some pretty cool tools & incentive systems for better coordination. From basics like rewarding, staking & slashing to DAO frameworks that keep growing in terms of their feature sets as well as the tooling around them ğŸ‘€

Moar on DAOs: https://t.co/OPMEC2JFld

For Defeating Moloch
One of my favorites, thank you @ameensol 

Itâ€™s about Moloch as the God of Coordination Failure & the ultimate cause of our inability to solve problems that plague societies.

Sounds great, so what makes us think we can kill the bastard?
Well...

Ethereum is Solarpunk

Solarpunk is an art movement imagining a better future & Ethereum is a technology for building the future. 
If we want to build a great future, we might want to combine the two ğŸ¤·â€â™‚ï¸

Props to @owocki for popularizing this one! https://t.co/b7biw9R7Bw

ReFi - degen to regen

Love this meme because it kind of takes degening - an act of chasing profit in a high risk, high reward manner - and turns it into something positive. Instead of trying to change human nature, it's about channelling it to public goods. https://t.co/ZNY7BjG3vl

Farming shitcoins & buying jpegs?
Props to exceptions but the vast majority of projects seem to be copies in hopes of quick profit; served to those mindlessly aping in eternal search for more gains.

A lot of degening & not enough regening ğŸ˜¬
Which brings us to... https://t.co/huzLBUJXzv

Ultra-sound money

Think the fact it was about more than â€œbetter moneyâ€ is what got most of us interested in Ethereum over Bitcoin?

Disregarding potential negative side effects of deflationary money, letâ€™s ask ourselves:

Ultra-sound money for what?

So letâ€™s get started with memes!

World Computer - Great but unfortunately not very true. If you tried using it to compute something, you must be incredibly wealthy & have a lot of time on your hands ğŸ˜…

Still, lets not dismiss it! Great thinking behind it https://t.co/5dqszaxtPt

Goes on about:
- Some of dominant memes
- Decentralized coordination; obstacles, pitfalls & solutions
- Building towards a decentralized future - but what kind?
- Inspiring people to think beyond personal financial freedom
- Building blocks & lego societies
- Simple ways to help

TL;DR

We build & build but we forget to ask ourselves why.

Meanwhile, every cycle dilutes idealism & profit becomes more of a driving force.

How do we get ppl to pick the path of value creation over path of profit extraction if weâ€™re not at least offering compelling visions?ğŸ¤·â€â™‚ï¸ https://t.co/P4igk4qTsX https://t.co/sxDKR7yjlP
